articles.description: Your Liverpool morning digest as Ian Wright brands Virgil van Dijk 'horrible' and Jorginho reveals what Mohamed Salah said to him
articles.content:
Here is your Liverpool morning digest for Thursday, March 3.
Ian Wright brands Virgil van Dijk 'horrible' for what he did against Chelsea
